entry.title: On the Importance of Environments in Human-Robot Coordination

author.name: Matthew C. Fontaine*, Ya-Chuan Hsu* Yulun Zhang*, Bryon Tjanaka, Stefanos Nikolaidis

entry.summary: We demonstrate the effect of the environment on human-robot coordination and introduce a framework for finding environments that elicit different coordination behaviors.
